subject: Football
lead_paragraph: JOE GANZ, left, set Nebraska records by throwing for 510 yards and 7 touchdowns, helping the Cornhuskers stop a five-game losing streak with a 73-31 victory over Kansas State.
snippet: JOE GANZ, left, set Nebraska records by throwing for 510 yards and 7 touchdowns, helping the Cornhuskers stop a five-game losing streak with a 73-31 victory over Kansas State.
